content: Hello @matklad here if I understand you suggest https://github.com/rust-analyzer/rust-analyzer/pull/4899#discussion_r441468043 to not change the label but how can I do to just change the display text without affecting the filtering in editor ?
And BTW is it only for warn or for all attributes ?
For all attributes. There are methods on CompletionItemBuilder which allow for fine grained control over how completions are represented
